localVoices.originalText: Mitoma was quiet today against Everton. Didn't get much service. The whole team looked flat.
We handled Mitoma well today. He had a few moments but our defence stayed tight. Good win for us.
Mitoma looked lively against Bournemouth. Some good dribbles but couldn't find the final ball. Brighton need more from their star man.
Mitoma absolutely unplayable today. That goal against Man City was stunning. Picked it up deep and drove through their defence.
What a goal from Mitoma at the Etihad. His ability to accelerate past defenders is terrifying. Brighton earned their point.
Every time Mitoma gets the ball you feel something is about to happen. Brilliant goal. He's our best player by a mile.

xThreads.originalText: WHAT A GOAL! Kaoru Mitoma picks up the ball in his own half, drives past THREE City players and finishes coolly past Ederson. Absolutely sensational from the Brighton winger!

replies.originalText: Hate to admit it but that was world class. Nobody could stop him once he got going. Unreal acceleration.
This man is genuinely one of the best dribblers in world football right now. Should be at a bigger club honestly.
Don't you dare try to take him from us! He's staying at Brighton forever

xThreads.originalText: Kaoru Mitoma has now scored 5 goals in his last 8 Premier League appearances. The Japanese international is in sensational form for Brighton.

replies.originalText: His decision making in the final third has improved so much. Last season he'd try one more dribble, now he picks the right moment to shoot.
Best G/A per 90 in the league for wingers this season. Numbers don't lie.

localVoices.originalText: Mitoma was decent in the FA Cup win over Burnley. Subbed off after 70 mins. Brighton progress comfortably.
Kubo dio una asistencia brillante contra el Barca antes de salir lesionado. Gran actuacion pero preocupa su estado fisico.

localVoices.originalText: Take Kubo es magia pura. Esa asistencia contra el Barca fue de clase mundial. Esperemos que la lesion no sea grave.
Kubo nos hizo dano otra vez. Ese chico tiene algo especial. Lastima que salio del club en su dia.

xThreads.originalText: TAKE KUBO vuelve a hacer historia! Asistencia magistral contra el Barcelona. El japones demuestra por que fue canterano del Barca. Una lastima su lesion en el minuto 66.

replies.originalText: Por que dejamos salir a este chico? Fue un error enorme. Ahora nos marca y asiste cada vez que jugamos contra el.
El mejor fichaje de nuestra historia. Lo que hace con el balon es arte puro. Esperamos que la lesion no sea grave!

xThreads.originalText: La Real Sociedad vence 2-1 al Barcelona en Anoeta. Take Kubo fue el mejor del partido hasta su lesion. Su asistencia para el gol de Oyarzabal fue de escandalo.

replies.originalText: Kubo contra Barcelona siempre es un espectaculo. Parece que juega con una motivacion extra contra su ex equipo.
El mejor jugador japones de la historia en LaLiga. Ningun otro ha tenido este nivel de consistencia.

localVoices.originalText: Kubo con otra asistencia contra Getafe. Siempre crea peligro. Es el motor creativo del equipo.
Kubo fue un dolor de cabeza para nuestra defensa toda la noche. Nos costo mucho pararle. Buen punto para la Real.
Kubo con una asistencia fantastica en el Metropolitano. Su vision de juego y capacidad de desborde son excepcionales esta temporada.
Kubo fue el mejor jugador del partido contra el Celta. Un gol brillante y domino el flanco derecho durante 90 minutos.
Take Kubo con un golazo. Este chico es pura clase. Lo mejor que nos ha pasado en anos.
Tomiyasu maakte zijn debuut in de laatste 10 minuten. Kort maar het team werd rustiger toen hij erin kwam.
Na 484 dagen blessureleed is Tomiyasu terug op het veld. Ajax-trainer Farioli prees zijn kalmte en ervaring. Veelbelovend debuut ondanks de korte invalbeurt.

xThreads.originalText: Na 484 dagen is Takehiro Tomiyasu terug op het veld! De Japanse verdediger maakt zijn debuut voor Ajax. Welkom terug, Tomi!

replies.originalText: Wat een moment! Het team speelde meteen rustiger toen hij erin kwam. Je kon zijn ervaring zien ondanks slechts 10 minuten.
Take care of him Ajax! One of the best defenders in the Premier League when fit. Gutted he left us but glad to see him back playing.
Farioli na de wedstrijd: 'Het team werd kalmer toen Tomiyasu erin kwam. Hij bracht rust en ervaring.' Veelbelovende start.

localVoices.originalText: Tough day at the Etihad. Kamada tried hard but the team couldn't get going against City. Subbed off at 60 mins.
Kamada ran the show in the Conference League tonight! An assist and constantly creating chances. This is the Kamada we signed.
Kamada was involved in two goal-building plays against Shelbourne. Glasner praised his contribution after the game. Palace cruise in Europe.
Kamada was tidy in midfield today. Palace controlled the game well and we couldn't deal with their passing.
Kamada was man of the match against Liverpool! His corner kick delivery led to the opening goal. What a performance at Selhurst Park.
Palace stun Liverpool 1-0 and Kamada was at the heart of everything. His set-piece delivery was outstanding. Glasner has found his playmaker.
Fair play to Kamada, he was excellent today. Controlled the tempo and that corner for the goal was perfectly placed. Frustrating loss for us.

xThreads.originalText: FULL TIME: Crystal Palace 1-0 Liverpool! A MASSIVE win at Selhurst Park. Daichi Kamada with a dominant midfield display - his corner kick delivery created our winning goal!

replies.originalText: Kamada has been Palace's best signing this season. Controls the tempo, creates chances, and his set-pieces are lethal. What a player.
We had no answer for Kamada today. He found pockets of space everywhere and that corner was perfect. Fair result tbh, we weren't good enough.
Told you all he was class at Frankfurt. The Bundesliga effect - players always improve after leaving Germany. Happy to see Kamada thriving!

xThreads.originalText: Man of the Match: Daichi Kamada. The Japanese international was everywhere for Palace today. 89% pass accuracy, 3 key passes, and the assist for the winner. Outstanding.

replies.originalText: Kamada's heat map is insane. He covered more ground than any other midfielder and still had the quality in the final third. Complete performance.

localVoices.originalText: Endo played at right-back tonight and put in a superb display against Qarabag. Versatility is his greatest asset. Slot clearly trusts him.
Endo is the ultimate squad player. Fills in wherever needed and never lets the team down. 6-0 win and he was solid throughout.
Endo came off the bench and added stability in midfield. Picked up an assist too. He's a reliable option off the bench.
Endo played at centre-back in the Carabao Cup and struggled. Palace scored three past Liverpool's makeshift defence. Not his natural position.
Shiogai mit nur 6 Minuten Einsatzzeit, aber er hat in kurzer Zeit Eindruck gemacht. Ein Dribbling gegen drei Spieler war bemerkenswert.
Der neue Japaner Shiogai kam von der Bank. Nur wenige Minuten aber das DebÃ¼t in der Bundesliga ist geschafft. Gespannt was noch kommt.
Shiogai bekam 45 Minuten gegen KÃ¶ln. Zeigte gute Laufbereitschaft und technisches KÃ¶nnen. Wolfsburg verlor aber das lag nicht an ihm.
Der Neuzugang aus den Niederlanden macht einen guten Eindruck. Shiogai hat Tempo und Technik. Wolfsburg braucht Geduld mit dem jungen Japaner.
Door naar de halve finale van de KNVB Beker! Sano speelde 90 minuten en hield het middenveld goed onder controle.
Kodai Sano met een goal en assist bij AZ! Wat een wedstrijd van de Japanner. Hij is een van de beste middenvelders in de Eredivisie dit seizoen.
SANO IS ONGELOOFLIJK! Goal en assist tegen AZ. Deze jongen is goud waard!

xThreads.originalText: GOAL! Kodai Sano schiet NEC op voorsprong bij AZ! 1-2! Wat een wedstrijd van de Japanse middenvelder!

replies.originalText: Sano is echt goed zeg. Goal en assist vandaag. NEC heeft een juweeltje gevonden.

localVoices.originalText: Weer een overwinning! Sano domineerde het middenveld tegen PEC Zwolle. Stabiel en betrouwbaar.
NEC door naar de kwartfinale na winst bij De Treffers. Sano speelde 90 minuten in het bekerduel.
Kodai Sano scoort bij NAC! Wat een wedstrijd, 7 doelpunten en NEC wint. Sano was belangrijk met zijn goal.
Spectaculaire wedstrijd in Breda! NAC 3-4 NEC. Kodai Sano scoorde een cruciale goal. De Japanner blijft indruk maken.
Kaishu Sano war heute wieder herausragend! Eine Vorlage und das Mittelfeld komplett unter Kontrolle. Was fÃ¼r ein Spieler!
Sano dominiert das Mittelfeld gegen Freiburg. Der japanische Nationalspieler zeigt warum er einer der besten defensiven Mittelfeldspieler der Liga ist.

xThreads.originalText: Sieg! Mainz 05 gewinnt 2:0 gegen Freiburg. Kaishu Sano mit einer Vorlage und einer dominanten Leistung im Mittelfeld! ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ

replies.originalText: Sano ist unser bester Spieler diese Saison. Absolut unverzichtbar im Mittelfeld.
Die japanischen Spieler in der Bundesliga liefern ab. Sano zeigt jede Woche Weltklasse-Leistungen.

localVoices.originalText: Unentschieden gegen Wolfsburg. Sano wie immer solide aber das Team konnte nicht den Sieg holen.
Mainz war zÃ¤h aber am Ende haben wir verdient gewonnen. Sano war ihr bester Spieler, hat uns viel Arbeit gemacht.
KAISHU SANO TRIFFT! Ein Traumtor gegen Bochum! Der defensive Mittelfeldspieler mit einem Schuss aus 20 Metern direkt in den Winkel!
Sano zeigt gegen Bochum dass er nicht nur ein defensiver Stabilisator ist. Das Traumtor krÃ¶nt eine perfekte Leistung. Mainz dominiert 3:0.

xThreads.originalText: TOOOOOR! Kaishu Sano mit einem TRAUMTOR aus der Distanz! 2:0 fÃ¼r Mainz 05! Was fÃ¼r ein Schuss! ğŸš€ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ

replies.originalText: Sano ist unglaublich. Ein defensiver Mittelfeldspieler der so schieÃŸen kann? Mainz hat da einen Diamanten.
Kaishu Sano goal of the month candidate. The technique, the power, the placement. Absolutely stunning.
